Title: You're Just Friends... for Now!
Description: Sure, you flirt sometimes, and the thought has crossed your mind about whether or not you two are meant to be, but when it comes right down to it, you're better off as just friends. Trust us, keep it platonic and you'll thank yourself later.You might be overly attached. You’re quick to fall head-over-heels and take it badly when things don’t go well.

Title: Voila...You are sooo very close to the “Happily Married” tag
Description: Hold on, because both of you make a great pair. You seem to know your partner quite well and that is why this relationship seems to move on well. You have your turbulent moments, but yes, you spring into love very soon.

Title: Best Buddies!! Enjoy this buddy love now
Description: Great, you both make the best of friends and if luck is on your side- you may never know when friendship turns into blissful love. Keep holding hands, talk about your interests and see how far this love boats sails away!

Title: YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A GOOD FRIEND
Description: You would seem to be a FRIENDLY type in your romantic aspirations: you're looking for a partner who will also be a good friend to you. Which of course is what everybody should be looking for, but don't forget that it's not the only thing you should look for; we've all got plenty of friends, but we don't think they would all be suitable as partners! Don't neglect to keep looking out for that spark as well!

Title: RATIONAL!
Description: In the love department, you stray away from the cliche. Your thinking is rational when it comes to dealing with your partner, and though relationships are meaningful to you, you are not that romantic. You prefer to have more unique, off-the-beaten-trail experiences with your guy, which can quite a good thing! Don't be afraid to embrace your girlier side.

Title: A BIT CHEESY?
Description: You find deep meaning and importance in gestures your partner makes for you, and you enjoy the somewhat cheesy things every once in a while. You hope for a knight in Shining Armor to come for you on his white horse one day. Down-to-earth guys may not understand you, but the whimsical ones will.

Title: Emotionally stable!
Description: You're somewhere around the balance point between logic and emotion, perhaps leaning a little bit towards emotion. This is a pretty good place to be, as long as you know when to apply either one or the other; there's a time and a place for everything!
